did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. Library. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Photographs, pictorial works and other graphic materials relating to relating to all aspects of Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Photographs, pictorial works and other graphic materials relating to relating to all aspects of Cornell University. The material can be browsed on microform.

Includes seven 8x20 negatives and prints: tennis in the Old Armory (2 negatives, 2 prints); Gil Dobie with football team, freshman with "F" (1 negative); band performing in Schoellkopf (2 negatives); audience watching football Old Armory? (1 negative); Gil Dobie and football team, 1929 (1 negative).

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Materials will require assistance for access. Contact the photo archivist.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Archives picture collection, #13-6-2497. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: Use the subject index, to look up a category number which corresponds to the microfiche. Then use the microfiche to view individual photos and retrieve their unique numbers. The number can then be used to locate the actual print photograph using the location guide. Approximately 500 photos were not microfilmed and will not appear in the microfiche.

unittitle.extref: Link to the guide containing categories of the types of photographs that are available.
